BayArea511r
  • Reference

    • Bay Area 511 Traffic
    • Bay Area 511 Transit Data

Operators

Operators provide public transport services.

get_operators()

Value

Dataframe of transit operators in the Bay Area

Examples

get_operators()
#> [1] 200
